title: FinSmart USA — Loans, Savings & Bank Compare
subtitle: A compact toolkit to plan EMIs, simulate savings growth, and compare bank rates.
paragraphs: FinSmart USA helps you quickly estimate loan EMIs, project savings growth, and compare bank APYs and fees to make informed personal finance choices.
This tool is a prototype for quick planning and education. For financial advice, consult a licensed professional.

faqs.a: No — bank rates in the tool are sample data and should be updated from official sources.

faqs.q: Can I export the amortization schedule?
faqs.a: Not yet — consider adding an export feature (CSV/PDF) in a follow-up.
